experience.name: Senior UX/UI Design • Cardano Warriors
experience.summary: As a Senior UX Designer at Cardano Warriors, I led the user-centered design process for various digital products, collaborating with cross-functional teams to define project goals. I conducted user research, created wireframes and prototypes, and iterated designs based on feedback and testing. Implementing best practices, I delivered intuitive and visually appealing user interfaces while also mentoring junior team members. My contributions consistently enhanced user satisfaction and drove business success.

experience.name: UX Strategy • Orion Labs
experience.summary: As a UX Strategy professional at Orion Labs, I developed and executed comprehensive UX strategies aligned with business objectives. Through market research and collaboration with cross-functional teams, I prioritized initiatives and created user personas, journey maps, and design systems. I established KPIs, provided guidance to team members, and fostered innovation. My strategic approach and collaborative efforts resulted in user-centered experiences that drove customer satisfaction and business success.
